name: Catch the Plane
description:
Catch the Plane

Be Brave to defend your target city!

Arrows up and down to move the bar to catch the plane

Press UP and DOWN key to move the stick.

Stop the attackers move to right side!

*There are different gain point and fail-to-catch cost for each plane, so be careful!

No need to catch all plane; instead, you need to catch "IMPORTANT PLANE", which often fly slowly in the high altitude.
